bibl.title: Ritual Texts for the Afterlife. Orpheus and the Bacchic Gold Tablets.
bibl.note: See in part. pp. 185-190: Appendix. Additional Bacchic texts [including the Gurôb Papyrus and the Edict of Ptolemy IV Philopator].
bibl.seg: GRAF Fritz and Sarah Iles JOHNSTON, Ritual Texts for the Afterlife. Orpheus and the Bacchic Gold Tablets.
Londres - New York, Routledge, 2007, 8°, x-246 pp., 1 portrait, 6 figg., 1 carte. ISBN 978-0-415-41555-4. £18.99.
See in part. pp. 185-190: Appendix. Additional Bacchic texts [including the Gurôb Papyrus and the Edict of Ptolemy IV Philopator].
